Job Posting:173449 - Position: W26 Co-op Developer, IT Application Excellence 173449 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Winter App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 09/25/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 09/17/2025 03:23 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country Kinaxis 700 Silver Seven Road Ottawa K2V 1C3 ON Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Job Description Location 2026 - Winter W26 Co-op Developer, IT Application Excellence 173449 Co-op Position Ottawa, ON Canada 8 months Hybrid CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List This is a hybrid position. You must be in the Ottawa, Canada office, at least three days a week. About the Team The IT Application Excellence team is responsible for supporting and managing applicatons / systems utitlized by business units in Kinaxis. In addition, we deliver solutions based on business needs as well as work closely with Security and Corporate System team to ensure proper security measures in place. This is a full-time, 8-month position, starting January 2026 and is open only to students in a registered Co-op Program. What you will do In this role, you will develop and support applications managed by the Enterprise Business Systems team at Kinaxis. Our team manages various applications used by Kinaxis, both internally and by customers, to enable the organization to grow, run smoothly, and most of all, make our employees, partners and customers happy. May also perform other projects as assigned. • Design, develop, and document solutions on our platforms and applications (i.e. ServiceNow, Jira, MuleSoft) • Work closely with senior developers and business analysts • Support the testing of new features and capabilities on existing applications and platforms, providing best practices and analysis to the rest of the team • Provides efficient solutions to team members within Corporate IT on the necessary support and enhancement of our business applications. • Ensures that business applications meet compliance requirements May perform other projects as assigned • Job Requirements What we are looking for • Currently enrolled in a program where software development is the primary focus • Experience in the development of web applications • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills • Excellent verbal and communication skills Self-starter with strong initiative • Things that would definitely help Experience with one or more of the following: NET framework • C#• Web development: HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, ASP.NET • Web services: SOAP, REST • SQL • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Application Link: https://careers-kinaxis.icims.com/jobs/33678/co-op-developer,-it-application- excellence/job?mobile=false&width=1195&height=500&bga=true&needsRedirect=false&jan1offset=-480&jun1offset=-420 Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
